description: Try our easy to follow Festive Dark Chocolate & Cherry Parfait recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Festive Dark Chocolate & Cherry Parfait Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 290g Nestle Bakers' Choice Dark Choc Melts

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly grease a 14cm x 21cm deep loaf pan. In a small saucepan, combine frozen cherries and 1/2 cup (125mL) of water, bring to the boil; cook 3 minutes or until heated through and softened; using a stick blender, blend until smooth, pour mixture through strainer and refrigerate until cool; discard seeds and solids.

Using an electric mixer, beat cream and Nestle sweetened condensed milk, until thick and creamy; remove 1/3 of the mixture in a large bowl; reserve. Fold in melted Nestle dark choc melts in remaining cream mixture. Pour into prepared pan. Smooth surface.
Fold reserved cherry puree into reserved cream mix until combined. Spoon over chocolate mixture, smooth surface and cover with plastic wrap; freeze overnight.
To make Choc Curls; pour extra melted Nestle dark choc melts over the base of a baking tray, refrigerate until just set. Then being careful; scrape at a 45° angle using a knife to create curls.
Dip pan in hot water for 10 seconds. Turn out onto a serving platter. Serve topped with choc curls and fresh cherries.
